name: IGI Gunner Shooting
description:
It's fray of battlefield where enemies are in front-line combat with you. Soldier, you are the best shooting commando and need to shootout the enemies from your modern fast-paced fps weapon. battleground is full of terrorist and critical strike. enemies are using gun, we are not known for. It's a death-match with enemies twice to our numbers. IGI Gunner Shooting, you are on a critical mission to counter the deadliest fire. In this critical ops, you have to shoot off all the enemies and skill strike.

Features:
-Gun sniper shooting game
- Real military environment
- All kinds of modern weapons
- Challenging missions
- Realistic shooting effect
- Amazing music and sound effects
- Fast-paced shooting game
